- [ ] feat (new feature/component)
- [ ] fix (bug fix)

## Checklist

- [ ] I ran `pnpm lint`
- [ ] I ran `pnpm build`
- [ ] I tested light and dark mode
- [ ] I tested keyboard accessibility
- [ ] I respected `prefers-reduced-motion`
- [ ] I updated docs (`README` / `CHANGELOG`) if needed
- [ ] I used `kinetikSpring` for spring-based transitions
- [ ] I did not introduce unrelated changes
